data.expected_result: It should bring you back to the game settings page
data.short_description: Switching orientation 2 times makes it closed in the background (Android 8.0+ spesific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to games - Press enable button so it will send you to device's settings - Switch orientation 2 times ( Portrait-> Landscape ,Landscape -> Portrait) - Press back button which is on your device
